snippet: Xiao Jianhua, the leader of the official student union at Peking University in 1989, sided with the government and found wealth and favor.
abstract: Xiao Jianhua, leader of official student union at Peking University in 1989, now controls sprawling business empire with interests largely in state-dominated industries; Xiao never opposed government during his student days, and after tepid attempt to represent fellow students during time of Tiananmen Square crackdown, he shifted course with immediate rewards; just after graduation, Xiao stepped into business world with direct financial support of the university, becoming prototype of politically connected financier.

byline.original: By DAVID BARBOZA and MICHAEL FORSYTHE

lead_paragraph: Xiao Jianhua, the leader of the official student union at Peking University in 1989, sided with the government and found wealth and favor.

headline.main: With Choice at Tiananmen, Student Took Road to Riches
headline.print_headline: With Choice at Tiananmen, Student Took Road to Riches
